config.prompt: prefect team member (blue archive), 1girl, solo, black hair, mekakure, short hair, bob cut, blunt bangs, halo, light skin, military uniform, grey jacket, red necktie, collared shirt, grey skirt, pleated skirt, miniskirt, peaked cap, thigh strap, leg belt
config.history: Sprites and mobs in Blue Archive meant to represent the bulk of Gehenna Academy's gendarmie, the Disciplinary Committee. The sprite is depicted with short, dark hair in a mixed hime and bob cut with small horns poking out of either side. The outfit consists of a gray-blue jacket, white button-up shirt, red necktie, dark gray/black pleated skirt, and an armband bearing the committee's emblem, alongside a military-style cap with Gehenna's logo on a golden shield adorning the front, and the Disciplinary Committee logo on the left side. just like their trinity task force memeber counterparts, these mobs have black eyes.
